Title: Prohibits the sale of snortable chocolate-based powder
Summary: Prohibits the sale of snortable chocolate-based powder.
LawCode: Add ยง399-dddd, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of snortable chocolate-based powder
